Oracle.ManagedDataAccess.Core NuGet Package 2.19.80 README
==========================================================

Release Notes: Oracle Data Provider for .NET Core

May 2020


New Features
============
None


Bug Fixes since Oracle.ManagedDataAccess.Core NuGet Package 2.19.70
===================================================================
Bug 27651535 CHARACTER DATA IS INCORRECTLY TRUNCATED WHEN RETRIEVING IT VIA DBLINK
Bug 30714021 LDAP.ORA NOT READ FROM LOCATION SPECIFIED BY ORACLECONNECTION.TNSADMIN
